parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of sketch segments that make up this detail circle profile

title: IDetailCircle.IGetProfileItems
description: Gets the sketch segments that make up this detail circle profile.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of sketch segments that make up this detail circle profile

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of sketch segments that make up this detail circle profile VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IDetailCircle::GetProfileItemsCount
before calling this method to determine the size of the array.
Do not modify the sketch segments returned by this method. This method only provides information about the profile geometry of the detail circle. To modify a detail circle, use
IDetailCircle::SetParameters
.
